thread.title: MusicNews | Villagers share new track 'Memoir' from forthcoming album - listen to it here now
thread.title_full: MusicNews | Villagers share new track 'Memoir' from forthcoming album - listen to it here now - entertainment.ie

author: Lauren Murphy
title: MusicNews | Villagers share new track 'Memoir' from forthcoming album - listen to it here now
text:
Yesterday, we brought you the news that Villagers were planning to release a new album in January and tour it nationwide.
'Where Have You Been All My Life?' is a collection of reworked versions of songs that span Conor O'Brien 's last few studio albums, as well as a couple of previously-unheard songs.
One of them is ' Memoir', which was originally written by O'Brien for Charlotte Gainsbourg. However, it has been recorded by Villagers for the new album and can be heard below:
MORE: Villagers announce Irish tour and new album for release in January
MORE: Watch: Villagers share video for new single 'Hot Scary Summer'
MORE: Conor O'Brien of Villagers joins line-up for David Lynch-themed concert at the NCH in November
